ygData.subject: Level 1 Pottery
ygData.msgSnippet: I came across a great Pottery reference page. The content of it wasn t anything that most of you haven t already learned.  For me it was enlightentment. As a
ygData.messageBody:
I came across a great Pottery reference page.
The content of it wasn't anything that most
of you haven't already learned. For me
it was enlightentment.

As a naive Smith, I learned two separate ore + flask of water.
Metal Bits.

I was stuck with Sharpening Stones and Rusty blades to increase my skill.

CLAY... Can be combined to get a similar Skill
boost early. I'm still failing, but it costs
less than failed Skewer sketches and components.

Combine on wheel.
3 SMALL blocks + Flask of water to get 1 Clay Block.

Combine 3 Clay Blocks + Flask to get 1 LARGE clay block. Simple.

The opposite effect can be applied.

Block of Clay + Flask yields a SMALL block of clay. (Doh).

Enjoy
Cleric Taven [Veeshan]
